'''''Parma Nölé'' 4''' is the fourth issue of the [[North East Tolkien Society]] journal ''[[Parma Nölé]]'', issued October [[2002]].

==Contents==
* "Letters from the Fellowship Staff" 
* "Q&A with Professor [[Verlyn Flieger]]"
* [[Anthony S. Burdge]]: "Tracing the Epic"
* [[Anthony S. Burdge]]: "What is [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s Mythology?"
* Jessica Burke: "Musings on Myth"
* [[Anthony S. Burdge]]: "[[Sideshow Collectibles]]/Heren Istarion presentation: Billy Boyd"
* Jessica Burke: "Sideshow Weta/Heren Istarion presentation: [[Viggo Mortensen]]"
* G.A. Ramos: "The Importance of Being [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]]"
* "New Edition of [[The Hobbit]]!"
* Jessica Burke: "Diary of a Hobbit"
* Staff Biographies
